text: The floating drawer trigger is mounted with #floatingDrawerTrigger and badge #floatingDrawerBadge plus an openFloatingDrawer handler.
The bundle/cart item count rises above zero.
A fixed bottom-right trigger appears with a Material-style icon and a badge showing the count capped to two digits (e.g., 99+), staying visible without scrolling.
The bundle/cart item count returns to zero.
The floating trigger hides entirely and the badge text clears so no zero state is shown.
The openFloatingDrawer handler fires to open the drawer and expose the animation hook/class for the drawer shell.
